entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry' throughout the passage.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts, described with a great walrus moustache and beaming mouth.

entities.name: zabini
entities.description: One of the Slytherins, greeted by Slughorn with particular enthusiasm.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, mentioned as sitting at a table with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, mentioned as sitting at a table with Ron and Harry.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: A student who shares a table with Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

relationships.description: Slughorn greeted Harry with particular enthusiasm.
Slughorn also greeted Zabini with particular enthusiasm.
Harry sits at a table with Ron and Hermione.
Harry sits at a table with Ron and Hermione.
Ron shares a table with Ernie, Harry, and Hermione.
